previewArticle.title: Colorado Rapids vs. Houston Dynamo | MLS Match Preview

recapArticle.title: Colorado Rapids 3, Houston Dynamo 0 | MLS Match Recap

timelineItems.title: KICKOFF: Colorado Rapids vs. Houston Dynamo

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.
Foul by Kamani Hill (Colorado Rapids).
Warren Creavalle (Houston Dynamo) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Dillon Powers (Colorado Rapids) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Jermaine Taylor (Houston Dynamo).

timelineItems.name: Brent W. New
timelineItems.text: Omar Cummings shaken up in the 9th minute ... seems to be ok now #COLvHOU

timelineItems.name: Matthew P Ronne
timelineItems.text: That was Nick Labrocca outrunning Omar Cummings. How times have changed #COLvHOU

timelineItems.name: Orange In The Oven
timelineItems.text: Dynamo just realized they're going to have to start fouling to slow the Rapids down. #ForeverOrange

timelineItems.name: OptaJack
timelineItems.text: 7 - @coloradorapids are undefeated in their last 7 @MLS games against Houston, winning 3 of their last 4 at home. Strong. #COLvHOU

timelineItems.name: Andreas Passas
timelineItems.text: Perfect day for a #Rapids game http://t.co/MUeDZ5fkk2

timelineItems.name: Andreas Passas
timelineItems.text: Perfect day for a #Rapids game http://t.co/MUeDZ5fkk2

timelineItems.name: Houston Dynamo
timelineItems.text: Time to turn our attention to tonight's match in Colorado. Two hours till kickoff! #COLvHOU

timelineItems.name: melmetzger
timelineItems.text: Is Balboa trying to do the Steven Segal look? #COLvHOU

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Let's get this ball rolling. #COLvHOU getting started right now. http://t.co/WPpmxSuObP http://t.co/utXBAb94iz

timelineItems.title: MISS: Dillon Serna attempts the bike and sends it high

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Dillon Serna (Colorado Rapids) left footed shot from the right side of the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Kamani Hill with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Colorado Rapids
timelineItems.text: Oh, now you're just showing out, @SernaDillon with a fancy attempt that flies wide. 1-0 #COLvHOU 14'

timelineItems.name: Marco Cummings
timelineItems.text: Dillon Serna with a bicycle attempt, goes wide of the mark 14' #Rapids96

timelineItems.comment: Lineups are announced and players are warming up.
Attempt missed. Giles Barnes (Houston Dynamo) right footed shot from the right side of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Omar Cummings.
Corner,  Colorado Rapids. Conceded by Kofi Sarkodie.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt blocked. Kamani Hill (Colorado Rapids) right footed shot from the center of the box is blocked.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Corey Ashe slides spectacularly to clear Hill’s shot off the line

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Kamani Hill (Colorado Rapids) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Dillon Powers.
Will Bruin (Houston Dynamo) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Drew Moor (Colorado Rapids).

timelineItems.name: Adam McCoy
timelineItems.text: Ready for the @ColoradoRapids to send the Dynamo packing! #COLvHOU @mblackwood1972

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Houston Dynamo. Conceded by Chris Klute.
Match ends, Colorado Rapids 3, Houston Dynamo 0.

timelineItems.desc: The Houston Dynamo travel to Dick’s Sporting Goods Park to take on the Colorado Rapids in an interconference clash.
timelineItems.title: HIGHLIGHTS: Colorado Rapids vs. Houston Dynamo | June 1, 2014

timelineItems.name: Marco Cummings
timelineItems.text: SHOULD GOAL LINE TECHNOLOGY MAKE ITS WAY TO #MLS ?! #Rapids96 #COLvHOU

timelineItems.comment: Hand ball by José Mari (Colorado Rapids).
Delay in match Deshorn Brown (Colorado Rapids) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: Matt Lopez
timelineItems.text: Colorado #Rapids

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.name: Daniel Boniface
timelineItems.text: Referee Drew Fischer is letting them play today. Not calling the ticky-tack stuff. #Rapids96 #COLvHOU

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Colorado Rapids. Conceded by Giles Barnes.
Corner,  Colorado Rapids. Conceded by Kofi Sarkodie.

timelineItems.name: Colorado Rapids
timelineItems.text: Drew Moor can't get a head on Dillon Serna's corner kick. Still 1-0 Rapids #COLvHOU 29'

timelineItems.name: Jimmy Espinoza
timelineItems.text: Cant even take a picture around her photo bombing me... #honduras #Israel #dynamo

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Omar Cummings (Houston Dynamo) header from very close range misses to the left. Assisted by Andrew Driver with a cross following a corner.
Attempt saved. Nick LaBrocca (Colorado Rapids) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Marvell Wynne with a headed pass.

timelineItems.title: CHANCE: Dillon Serna can’t connect to Brown’s cross

timelineItems.name: Ben Hickey
timelineItems.text: 30 mins in and its 1-0 to #Rapids96, really should be more but for a terrible Kamani Hill miss. Dominant performance so far. #COLvHOU

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: HIGHLIGHT: Corey Ashe with the hustle play to save @HoustonDynamo and prevent a second @ColoradoRapids goal. http://t.co/WdQddVHs5R #COLvHOU

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Deshorn Brown (Colorado Rapids) header from the left side of the six yard box is saved in the top left corner.
timelineItems.title: SHOT: Deshorn Brown’s header is collected by Hall

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Deshorn Brown (Colorado Rapids) header from the left side of the six yard box is saved in the bottom left corner.

timelineItems.name: James H
timelineItems.text: Dynamo could be down 0-3 right now. Not sure what Taylor was doing there. #COLvHOU ⚽️�

timelineItems.name: Daniel Boniface
timelineItems.text: Powers with a nice pass to Brown into space and Brown puts one on a platter for Dillon Serna who can't hit it true. #Rapids96 #COLvHOU

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Colorado Rapids 2, Houston Dynamo 0. Deshorn Brown (Colorado Rapids) right footed shot from the right side of the box to the bottom left corner.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Deshorn Brown beats Tally Hall at the far post

timelineItems.name: Michael Carrell
timelineItems.text: Oh it's getting ugly #Dynamo

timelineItems.name: Jeff Strong
timelineItems.text: It's looking to be another one of THOSE type of #Dynamo games 0 - 2

timelineItems.name: Daniel Boniface
timelineItems.text: No indecision that time. Deshorn Brown with a 1-v-1 with Tally Hall and hits it first time. 2-0 #Rapids96 #COLvHOU 35'

timelineItems.name: Matthew P Ronne
timelineItems.text: Powers frees Brown again, No doubt about it this time #Brace #COLvHOU

timelineItems.name: HoustonDynamo
timelineItems.text: 35' Goal Colorado. Deshorn Brown again, gets behind the defense and slides a low shot to the far post past Hall. 0-2. #COLvHOU

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Kamani Hill (Colorado Rapids).
Warren Creavalle (Houston Dynamo) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: Colorado Rapids
timelineItems.text: Brown with the first half brace and this is what we've been waiting to see from the young striker. #Rapids96

timelineItems.name: Marco Cummings
timelineItems.text: 35' Brown with his second. Tucks it bottom left corner past the keeper. He's suddenly found clinical finishing. #Rapids96 lead 2-0 #COLvHOU

timelineItems.name: Daniel Boniface
timelineItems.text: Deshorn Brown picked out the far post and hit it first touch from the right side. He and Powers are clicking tonight. #Rapids96 #COLvHOU

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Drew Moor (Colorado Rapids).
Giles Barnes (Houston Dynamo) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: GOAL! Deshorn Brown bags his brace. The low finish gives @ColoradoRapids a lead 2-0. #COLvHOU

timelineItems.name: Aaron Eaves
timelineItems.text: It's even more evident how important Davis, Boniek and Clark are to this team. #COLvHOU

timelineItems.name: David dj dmx Mangum
timelineItems.text: #rapidsthuglife #Rapids 2 #Dynamo 0 so far!!!

timelineItems.name: Thor Morgan
timelineItems.text: To quote a one Marcelo Balboa, that was a "fantabulous" finish #Rapids96 #COLvHOU

timelineItems.name: Kenny Price
timelineItems.text: Deshorn offsides, but sometimes those calls go your way. #COLvHOU

timelineItems.desc: Warren Creavalle (Houston Dynamo) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Warren Creavalle slides in on Jose Mari

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Colorado Rapids 1, Houston Dynamo 0. Deshorn Brown (Colorado Rapids) header from very close range to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Marvell Wynne with a cross.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Deshorn Brown heads in Wynne’s cross

timelineItems.name: Rapids-MileHighClub
timelineItems.text: Can Kamani Hill keep up his play from last week? #COLvHOU

timelineItems.comment: José Mari (Colorado Rapids) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Warren Creavalle (Houston Dynamo).

timelineItems.name: HoustonDynamo
timelineItems.text: 41' Horst plays Bruin through on the break, he tries to get Cummings on the overlap but Irwin comes off his line to collect. #COLvHOU

timelineItems.name: Marco Cummings
timelineItems.text: Twice now it's looked like Giles Barnes would beat Drew Moor with pace but Moor has stepped last second both times. #Rapids96 #COLvHOU

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Warren Creavalle (Houston Dynamo).
Dillon Powers (Colorado Rapids) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Daniel Boniface
timelineItems.text: Dillon Powers has been sitting in deep and pulling the strings. He looks good tonight. #Rapids96 #COLvHOU

timelineItems.name: James H
timelineItems.text: Stoppage time substitute in first half. Cold-blooded, Dom. #COLvHOU ⚽️�

timelineItems.comment: First Half ends, Colorado Rapids 2, Houston Dynamo 0.

timelineItems.name: Bean
timelineItems.text: We can blame the defense all day, but we need to be able to score goals too. Offense is very poor. #COLvHOU

timelineItems.name: joe offebacher
timelineItems.text: So unless there's a drastic change in the 2nd Half guess which team in #MLS will be the first to 8 Losses? Yup, your 4th Place #Dynamo .

timelineItems.name: Daniel Boniface
timelineItems.text: #Rapids96 got the early goal and kept their foot on the pedal. Could be 4-0 if they had put away chances #COLvHOU

timelineItems.comment: Second Half begins Colorado Rapids 2, Houston Dynamo 0.
Offside, Colorado Rapids. Shane O'Neill tries a through ball, but Deshorn Brown is caught offside.
Corner,  Houston Dynamo. Conceded by Chris Klute.

timelineItems.name: Daniel Boniface
timelineItems.text: Deshorn Brown strikes early. A wide open header. 1-0 #Rapids96 #COLvHOU

timelineItems.title: SHOT: Jose Mari’s swerving effort is tipped behind

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Colorado Rapids 3, Houston Dynamo 0. Kamani Hill (Colorado Rapids) right footed shot from the center of the box to the bottom right corner.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Kamani Hill flicks it in off the corner

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. José Mari (Colorado Rapids) right footed shot from long range on the right is saved in the bottom left corner.
Corner,  Colorado Rapids. Conceded by Tally Hall.

timelineItems.name: Kendall B.
timelineItems.text: Kamani The Thrill Hill. Another sensational goal from him. 3-0 Rapids!!! #COLvHOU

timelineItems.name: David Dir
timelineItems.text: Kamari hill , redemption wow , great effort tonight #COLvHOU Houston definitely looks spent

timelineItems.name: Marco Cummings
timelineItems.text: GOAL! 51' Kamani Hill with a rediculous back heel flick off a corner and #Rapids96 lead 3-0 #COLvHOU

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: GOAL! Kamani Hill with the audacious back heel flick off a corner. @ColoradoRapids up 3-0. #COLvHOU

timelineItems.name: Brent W. New
timelineItems.text: Doing his best Bruce Lee impersonation, Kamani Hill just jump kicked at a corner kick to put the Rapids up 3-zip #COLvHOU

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Dillon Serna (Colorado Rapids) right footed shot from a difficult angle on the right is high and wide to the left.
timelineItems.title: MISS: Dillon Serna first-times it high

timelineItems.name: Colorado Rapids
timelineItems.text: HAS to be Goal of the Week from @Kamani11. So dirty. So pretty. But so dirty. #COLvHOU

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Dillon Serna (Colorado Rapids) right footed shot from a difficult angle on the right is just a bit too high. Assisted by Kamani Hill with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Daniel Boniface
timelineItems.text: No Sanchez. No Buddle. No Torres. But suddenly the #Rapids96 offense is firing on all cyliders. #COLvHOU

timelineItems.desc: Dan Haiek and Armchair Analyst Matt Doyle preview the Sunday evening inter-conference battle between the Colorado Rapids and Houston Dynamo. What's the best tactical setup for the Dynamo in this one? Who should partner Deshorn Brown up top? Find out Sunday at 8pm ET on Univision Deportes.

timelineItems.text: @ClintIrwin 's socks look slick from this side of the press box #unrelatedgametweets #Rapids96 #COLvHOU

timelineItems.name: Daniel Boniface
timelineItems.text: Kamani Hill told me a 1st half near-miss ate at him last week, but he scored in the 2nd. Same script tonight, it seems. #Rapids96 #COLvHOU

timelineItems.text: Marlon Hairston just called over by Pablo Mastroeni. Prepping to come in, it appears. #Rapids96 #COLvHOU

timelineItems.text: HIGHLIGHT: @Kamani11 is kung fu scoring. This kick was anything but boring --> http://t.co/uAempNfVVs #COLvHOU

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Marlon Hairston (Colorado Rapids) right footed shot from the right side of the box misses to the right.
timelineItems.title: MISS: Marlon Hairston rolls it wide after the break

timelineItems.name: Thor Morgan
timelineItems.text: Remember when we all said Wynne was terrible at right back? #Rapids96 #COLvHOU

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: GOAL! Deshorn Brown heads home a great cross from Marvell Wynne. @ColoradoRapids up 1-0 within five minutes. #COLvHOU

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Marlon Hairston (Colorado Rapids) right footed shot from the right side of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Dillon Serna.

timelineItems.desc: Will Bruin (Houston Dynamo) hits the bar with a right footed shot from outside the box.
timelineItems.title: POST: Will Bruin's monstrous shot smashes off the post

timelineItems.comment: Will Bruin (Houston Dynamo) hits the right post with a right footed shot from outside the box. Assisted by Tally Hall.

timelineItems.name: Colorado Rapids
timelineItems.text: Hairston wastes no time. The rookie is still looking for his first career goal but this attempt was off target. 70' #COLvHOU

timelineItems.name: Marco Cummings
timelineItems.text: Hairston on a breakaway as soon as he's subbed in. Shot could've done better. #Rapids96 #COLvHOU

timelineItems.name: Daniel Boniface
timelineItems.text: Bruin rattles the woodwork on a first-time shot off a nice ball over the top. First real chance for Houston 73' 3-0 #Rapids96 #COLvHOU

timelineItems.name: HoustonDynamo
timelineItems.text: 72' Crossbar! Bruin rips a half volley from just outside the box and it thumps off the woodwork. That kind of night. #COLvHOU

timelineItems.name: Colorado Rapids
timelineItems.text: Omar Cummings gets a smattering of applause from #Rapids96 fans as he trots off. Still lots of love for him around here! #COLvHOU

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Kofi Sarkodie (Houston Dynamo).
Kamani Hill (Colorado Rapids) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt saved. Dillon Serna (Colorado Rapids) left footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the top right corner.
Corner,  Colorado Rapids. Conceded by Tally Hall.

timelineItems.desc: Dillon Serna (Colorado Rapids) hits the right post with a right footed shot from a difficult angle on the right.
timelineItems.title: POST: Dillon Serna hits the post from a tight angle

timelineItems.name: HoustonDynamo
timelineItems.text: 77' Serna tries to go top shelf on Hall from the right side of the box, but the keeper is alert to tip it over the bar. #COLvHOU

timelineItems.comment: Dillon Serna (Colorado Rapids) hits the right post with a right footed shot from a difficult angle on the right. Assisted by Marlon Hairston.

timelineItems.name: HoustonDynamo
timelineItems.text: 79' Serna again down the right side, hits the outside of the post from a tight angle. #COLvHOU

timelineItems.name: Daniel Boniface
timelineItems.text: Last week, #Rapids96 got the early lead, but got chewed out at halftime for not being more aggressive. #COLvHOU

timelineItems.name: SoccerTalkLuis
timelineItems.text: What the hell?? Tally Hall needs to worry about this match not Brad Davis in the World Cup!!! #COLvHOU @MLS

timelineItems.name: Marco Cummings
timelineItems.text: 79' Danny Mwanga subbing in for Deshorn Brown. Brown gets a standing ovation from the crowd. #Rapids96 #COLvHOU

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Houston Dynamo. Jason Johnson tries a through ball, but Will Bruin is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Colorado Rapids
timelineItems.text: Man of the Match time. Brown with 2 goals, an incredible goal from Hill, Powers with 2 assists...the list goes on. Who gets your vote?

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Dillon Serna (Colorado Rapids) left footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked.
Foul by Nick LaBrocca (Colorado Rapids).
Alexander López (Houston Dynamo) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: HoustonDynamo
timelineItems.text: 83' Last-ditch tackle by Horst as Serna ran free into the box. #COLvHOU

timelineItems.comment: Kamani Hill (Colorado Rapids) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Kofi Sarkodie (Houston Dynamo).

timelineItems.name: James H
timelineItems.text: Houston is abysmal in Colorado. Not sure if they've won since a @stuholden 1-0 goal back in the day. #COLvHOU ⚽️�

timelineItems.name: Orange In The Oven
timelineItems.text: Houston is looking slow and chaotic. #ForeverOrange

timelineItems.name: Daniel Boniface
timelineItems.text: And that's the full 90. #Rapids96 keep the clean sheet. 3-0. Deshorn Brown with a brace, Kamani Hill adds a beauty. #COLvHOU

timelineItems.comment: Second Half ends, Colorado Rapids 3, Houston Dynamo 0.
